enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Pre-Registration is restricted to Dance Majors and Minors at this time. Registration will open to all undergraduates during the second week of regular registration.
title: SoC DANCE 250-0-21 Modern II

instructors.instructor_addr: Dance Offices, Marjorie Ward Marshall Dance Center

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course will explore the intermediate level of the Lester Horton Technique. We will focus on balance, stamina, movement quality, flexibility, technical skills, coordination, and dynamics. Students will gain a deeper understanding of the Horton Technique and progress their development as an artist.

subject: DANCE
